name: fallen-leaves
description: Fallen leaves is a simple slideshow viewer, the photos shows as falling leaves in the autumn.
author: Miguel de Dios Matias <tres.14159@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run cp_css_bootstrap && npm run cp_files_jqueryui && rm ./dist -rf && electron-packager . fallen-leaves --icon=./images/icon.png --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite
scripts.deb64: npm run cp_css_bootstrap && npm run cp_files_jqueryui && npm run build && cp images/icon* ./dist/fallen-leaves-linux-x64/resources && electron-installer-debian --src dist/fallen-leaves-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch amd64 --config deb.package.conf.json
scripts.snap: npm run cp_css_bootstrap && npm run cp_files_jqueryui && electron-builder --linux snap
scripts.start: npm run cp_css_bootstrap && npm run cp_files_jqueryui && electron --no-sandbox main.js
scripts.cp_files_jqueryui: cp node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/*.js ./js/ && cp node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/*.css ./css/ && cp node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/images ./css/ -r
